sentence.Network_en: We got home and went sledding on the small hill in our back yard.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们回到家里，然后去后院的小山上滑雪橇。

sentence.Network_en: After it had stopped snowing, we all went sledding.
sentence.Network_cn: 雪停之后, 我们都去滑雪橇.

sentence.Network_en: Luck has come our way at last , after all the hard sledding.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们拼命苦干了多年,终于交上好运了.

entry.def: A sled is the same as a sledge .
If you go sledding, you ride on a sled.

example.ex: We got home and went sledding on the small hill in our back yard.
example.tran: 我们回到家里，然后去后院的小山上滑雪橇。

means.word_mean: 1. the sport of riding on a sled or sleigh
